title: CHOGM: Prince Charles to take up Tangalle murder
content: Prince Charles has offered to help in the effort to win justice for a British man who was murdered in Sri Lanka on Christmas Eve 2011, according to a report in The Guardian/The Observer yesterday. It said: The high-profile case of Khuram Shaikh, a 32-year-old Red Cross worker from Rochdale who was killed in 2011,…
